=== Class-Data Sharing

Use CDS to shave off 10-25% of your boot times.

Recent improvements:

* default CDS archives â‘« (https://openjdk.org/jeps/341[JEP 341])
* dynamic CDS archives â‘¬ (https://openjdk.org/jeps/350[JEP 350])
* auto-generated CDS â‘² (https://bugs.openjdk.org/browse/JDK-8261455[JDK-8261455])

And more to come from https://openjdk.org/projects/leyden[Project Leyden].
